oracle.ucp.util.logging
Class UCPFormatter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Formatter
      oracle.ucp.util.logging.UCPFormatter

public class UCPFormatter
extends java.util.logging.Formatter

Universal Connection Pool custom formatter for log messages. <p/> This can be specified in a log property file passed as Java's java.util.logging.config.file command-line option.
